attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app. The quality of the app is pretty reflective of the quality of Trump. It glitches terribly, lots of misspelled words and incorrect grammar make items hard to follow, it took a long time to download and took up over 75% of my available storage space. Plus there was no valuable information. Save yourself the trouble and don’t download.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Instructions weren’t clear: told me to make a grilled cheese sandwich 🥪 but without any cheese 🧀😫 App then proceded to make the background of my phone orange 🍊. A few hours later, my phone started leaking orange fluid. Idk bout y’all but I think the orange cheeto is trying to reach out to us on a literal level.... Anywho, whilst y’all are reading this review, go watch Hannibal cuz we stan Hannibal Lecter 😊🥵🥵 Eat the rich. Eat the rude. 😊😊👌🏼💅🏼 periodt.
attributes.title: Big Boomer Energy

attributes.review: i, of course, support my lord,  and America's savior, mister trump. however, when looking for basic human rights and whatnot, i couldn't find it like my dad. so yeah, not fun. plus, it asked me for my phone number??? other things as well that's completely deplorable. how can such a disgraceful app be allowed?? apple, please do something about this. it's horrific and frankly, should be locked up😳😔😤😖😡🤪💛🧚‍♀️💫💘😌💕😭😭😭
attributes.title: absolute SCAM

attributes.review: I opened the app and without a welcome it started asking me for personal information which I do not five out until I feel like I can trust you. I cant trust a random cheeto that asks for my number. and where did this cheeto even learn to text anyways. I advise you replace that cheeto in a suite with something more friendly and some you would want to see like a puppy❤️
attributes.title: i’m scared

attributes.review: This app has terrible blinded my sister forever when I got on it I was told to give my location and was receiving dirty text messages from a secret number By somebody who was wanting to be called t-daddy later.‼️I am so upset because my little sister was watching spy ninjas and that’s when a picture of an penis poped up from t-daddy with a message that said t-daddy takeover 2020
attributes.title: T-daddy

attributes.review: I downloaded this to help support the greates president we have ever had. but is took 6 years to download!!!! lasted longer than the confederacy!!!  after i left my cousins room at 2 am 👁👄👁 i open my phone to see it took up 24 gigabytes!!!! unbelievable. i really was hoping u could support the president who is the best and these snowflakes should worship!!  but this app make me mad 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: DIFFICULT

attributes.review: I tried to find some reason that people like him, but at last I couldn’t. Once I downloaded the app the most ugliest horrific nasty photos appeared (they’re very orange).. and I ended up in the hospital because I puked up all my guts and died in the very same hospital!!! 1,000 times DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!🤬🤬 He also asked me for my number and I am Ultimately disgusted by this because he has a wife and kids.
attributes.title: I died.. RIP 🙏

attributes.review: When I first opened the app, I saw a black screen that immediately flashed to a video of an old man touching himself in a sexual way. The man stared as if he was looking straight at me. To this day, I still feel as though he is watching me as I type this. I'm horrified of the information this app has of me and my family now. I do not feel safe in my home anymore.
attributes.title: Genuinely traumatizing

attributes.review: I hate it. This app gave my phone a virus I had to go the apple store to get them to fix it!  The virus would call random people in my contacts send emails to my boss and would lock me out of my own phone!!! I would never recommend this to any of my family and friends!!! If I could give this crappy app zero stars I would!!!
attributes.title: The worst app on the store

attributes.review: Now, I may not be the brightest tool in the shed, but I know for a fact that a Cheeto is not a President. Nor should it be allowed rights. The only thing a Cheeto should be allowed to do, is be a delicious snack. But frankly, this president can’t even be that. This app was a waste of time. Now I hope this helps. Because it’s what I always say “if you want something done right, DONT hire a Cheeto to do it for you”✨🦋💖🧚🏻✌️✌️
attributes.title: Disgusting🤮🤮🤮🤮
